alert.note: Alert for Baldwin Peninsula and Selawik Valley; Chukchi Sea Coast; Eastern Norton Sound and Nulato Hills; Southern Seward Peninsula Coast; St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 03 at 2:54AM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...Strong Storm Moving to the Bering and Chukchi Wednesday to Friday... A strong storm will develop in the Sea of Ohkotsk Monday night and move to Chukotka Wednesday, then to Wrangel Island by Thursday morning. Strong southerly to southwesterly winds are expected to accompany this storm moving into the Eastern Bering Sea and Chukchi Sea Wednesday afternoon and evening with the weather front moving to the coast early Thursday morning. Behind the front winds will turn more westerly. This storm will bring an elevated risk of coastal flooding from the Bering Strait to Point Hope Wednesday night into Friday, with high surf possible on south and west facing shores of Norton Sound Wednesday night into Friday. For the latest forecasts go to www.weather.gov/fairbanks.
